alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 30 at 9:34AM MST until January 30 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Areas with visibility down to 1/4 mile or lower in dense fog. * WHERE...Deer Park, Wilbur, Bridgeport, Nespelem, Bonners Ferry, Davenport, Fairfield, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Ione, Airway Heights, Chesaw Road, Ritzville, Coeur d`Alene, Sherman Pass, Spokane Valley, Priest River, Coulee City, Okanogan, Colville, Brewster, Metaline Falls, Omak, Grand Coulee, Orin-Rice Road, Fruitland, Athol, Republic, Boulder Creek Road, Oroville, Tiger, Sandpoint, Ephrata, Eastport, Worley, Northport, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Inchelium, Wauconda, Clark Fork, Harrington, Springdale-Hunters Road, Odessa, Quincy, Disautel Pass, Downtown Spokane, Rockford, Creston, Flowery Trail Road, Tonasket, Post Falls, Moses Lake, Newport, Metaline, Cheney, Hayden, Chewelah, Kettle Falls, and Othello. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Rapidly changing conditions can make driving challenging.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
